config.question: The conspirators of the Vesey conspiracy were compared to __________.

choices.content: the Native American tribes of the United States
the militants of the French Revolution
the Scottish rebels of the British Isles
the pirates roaming the high seas on the Atlantic

answer_3.response: Consider This: Denmark Vesey had organized slaves, planning to seize armories, arm the slaves, and burn the city of Charleston. The plot was uncovered by citizens of Charleston before Vesey and his conspirators could implement their plan. See L.O. 11.1 What factors made living conditions for southern blacks more or less difficult?
